reviewText: This 3 dvd set features The Dead Want Women a zombie ghost story of a 20's silent era actress who kills herself and her lovers only to return seeking new playtoys. This movie has a porn like scene in the begining that may offend some. Next up is Prison of the Dead. A fun horror somewhat homoerotic zombie flick. Last you get The Dead Hate The Living a gorefest zombie flick about some wannabe movie makers who release an undead madman who creates an zombie movie. This set is a much for horror fans.

I Had seen this 3 DVD set in 7-11 several times before they quit carrying it.  Well I walked into a 7-11 today, and what did I see, this VERY same set I should have bought earlier.  At a price of $3.99, I couldn't resist!
  As much as I hate to admit it....I am liking this set.  And as many people already know......I LOVE MY CHEESE!!!!!!  Low budget Zombie films PRICELESS!!!
